select a.id,a.Title,0 as fromFlag,CONCAT(a.Fpath,'/',a.Fname) fullPath,a.thumbnailpath,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(a.Fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(a.Fname)))) as FileExt,a.UpdateDT,a.DloadTimes, (SELECT case when COUNT(t.assetId) = 0 then a.displayLevel else (sum(t.Ascore) / COUNT(t.assetId) + a.displayLevel) / 2 end avgScore from z_assetevaluate t where t.assetId = a.id and t.flag = 0 and t.IsScore = 0 and t.aType = 1) avgScore from z_resource a left join z_resnav c on a.ResCode=c.ResCode left join j_syscourse d on c.StructCode=d.TFcode where a.id = #{resId} and a.flag = 0 and c.flag=0 and d.flag=0 and a.fromflag in
#{item}
and d.typeFlag in (0,1) union
select id,Title,fromFlag,fullPath,thumbnailpath,FileExt,UpdateDT,DloadTimes,avgScore from ( select a.id,a.Title,0 as fromFlag,CONCAT(a.Fpath,'/',a.Fname) fullPath,a.thumbnailpath,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(a.Fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(a.Fname)))) as FileExt,a.UpdateDT,a.DloadTimes, (SELECT case when COUNT(t.assetId) = 0 then a.displayLevel else (sum(t.Ascore) / COUNT(t.assetId) + a.displayLevel) / 2 end avgScore from z_assetevaluate t where t.assetId = a.id and t.flag = 0 and t.IsScore = 0 and t.aType = 1) avgScore from z_resource a left join x_resourcetype b on a.MType = b.id left join j_filetypedetail jf on REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(a.Fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(a.Fname))))=jf.FormatCode left join z_resnav c on a.ResCode=c.ResCode left join j_syscourse d on c.StructCode=d.TFcode where a.flag = 0 and a.id != #{resId} and c.flag=0 and d.flag=0 and a.fromflag in
#{item}
and d.typeFlag in (0,1) and d.tfcode like CONCAT(#{tfcode},'%')
and a.mtype in ('')
and a.mtype in #{item}
order by avgScore desc,b.DisplayIndex asc,jf.orderNum asc,id
order by DloadTimes desc,b.DisplayIndex asc,jf.orderNum asc,id
order by UpdateDT desc,b.DisplayIndex asc,jf.orderNum asc,id )tmp

select distinct a.id,a.name Title,1 fromFlag,a.assetPath fullPath,a.assetPath as thumbnailpath,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(a.assetPath),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(a.assetPath)))) as FileExt from z_asset a where a.id = #{resId} and a.flag = 0 and a.FileType = 'A'
union all
select distinct a.id,a.Title,0 as fromFlag,CONCAT(a.Fpath,'/',a.Fname) fullPath,a.thumbnailpath,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(a.Fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(a.Fname)))) as FileExt from z_resource a left join z_resnav c on a.ResCode=c.ResCode left join j_syscourse d on c.StructCode=d.TFcode where a.flag = 0 and c.flag=0 and d.flag=0 and a.fromflag in
#{item}
and d.typeFlag in (0,1) and c.StructCode like CONCAT(#{tfcode},'%')
union all
select DISTINCT a.id,a.Title,a.fromFlag,CONCAT(a.Fpath,'/',a.Fname) fullPath,a.thumbnailpath,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(a.Fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(a.Fname)))) as FileExt from z_districts_resource a left join x_resourcetype b on a.MType = b.id and b.flag = 0 LEFT JOIN z_districts_resnav c on c.flag=0 and a.ResCode=c.ResCode left join j_syscourse d on d.flag=0 and c.StructCode=d.tfcode where a.flag = 0 and a.scopeId = #{schoolId} and c.StructCode like CONCAT(#{tfcode},'%')
union all
select DISTINCT a.id,a.Title,a.fromFlag,CONCAT(a.Fpath,'/',a.Fname) fullPath,a.thumbnailpath,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(a.Fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(a.Fname)))) as FileExt from z_districts_resource a left join x_resourcetype b on a.MType = b.id and b.flag = 0 LEFT JOIN z_districts_resnav c on c.flag=0 and a.ResCode=c.ResCode left join j_syscourse d on d.flag=0 and c.StructCode=d.tfcode where a.flag = 0 and a.scopeId = #{districtId} and c.StructCode like CONCAT(#{tfcode},'%')

select distinct * from (select a.id,a.Title,a.keyWord,a.Des,a.fSize,e.MType,e.id typeId,a.DLoadTimes,a.ClickTimes,0 as fromflag,a.fname,a.Fpath, (select COUNT(tt.id) from z_assetevaluate tt where tt.assetId = a.id and tt.flag = 0 and tt.IsScore = 0 and tt.aType = 1)userNum, (select ascore from z_assetevaluate ttt where ttt.assetId = a.id and ttt.flag = 0 and ttt.IsScore = 0 and ttt.aType = 1 and ttt.UserId = #{userId} ) score, (SELECT case when COUNT(t.assetId) = 0 then 0 else (sum(t.Ascore) / COUNT(t.assetId)) end avgScore from z_assetevaluate t where t.assetId = a.id and t.flag = 0 and t.IsScore = 0 and t.aType = 1) avgScore,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(a.Fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(a.Fname)))) as FileExt,a.isDWJ from z_resource a left join z_resnav b on a.ResCode=b.ResCode left join j_syscourse c on c.tfcode = b.StructCode left join x_resourcetype e on a.MType = e.id where b.flag=0 and c.flag=0 and a.flag=0 and a.id =#{resId} ) a limit 1
select id,name,tfcode from j_syscourse where LOCATE(tfcode,#{structCode}) > 0 ORDER BY tfcode

select StructCode from z_resnav nav LEFT JOIN z_resource res on nav.ResCode = res.ResCode LEFT JOIN j_syscourse sys on sys.tfcode = StructCode where res.id = #{resId} and nav.flag = false and res.flag = false and sys.flag = false ORDER BY LOCATE(#{curTfcode},StructCode) desc limit 1
mapper.update: update z_resource set ClickTimes = ClickTimes+1 where rescode =#{rescode}
update z_resource set DLoadTimes = DLoadTimes+1 where rescode =#{rescode}
